message: I wanted to drive to the supermarket, but my car did not start. I have fastened my seatbelt. And hints? =P
There could be a lot reasons. You need to show us the relevant part from the php.ini ...
however for some reason it always returns false
I have added the path to sendmail in php.ini
well I am getting the following in my mail.log
sendmail[3660]: unable to qualify my own domain name (DynusT) -- using short name
This is my first time setting up a mail server (sendmail) and my goal is to have mail working in PHP
Seriously, that's not enough info you gave us there. Actually, almost none.
DynusT is my machine name, for some reason it's intrepreting it as a domain?
Use pear mail and stop wingeing
